name: ARize
description: ARIze platform has a unique ability to connect 3D creators to businesses, in order to create enhanced 3D experiences (through technology built around Augmented Reality, Virtual Reality, Metaverses, and even full-blown games built on top of the ARize platform framework) to be shared with their audiences with a click of a button, across all devices available in the market, without having to download a specific App or integrate any special technology.
